0.1.name: wordpress/geolocaladmin
0.1.description:
A plugin to detect any backend user GPS position and show them via a sidebar widget. The plugin detect on panel page and on widget page. It allows to track several users, and also block a position. Its a perfect tool for travveling blogs wich want to show theyre last connect position without copy/past a googlemap everytime...

On version 0.2 theyre will be more usefull widget setting, a plugin setting page (styles options, global options) and the abbility to show any widget active maps with shortcodes.
